title: In memorie of that lively patterne of true pietie, and unstain'd loyaltie, Mrs Susanna Harris the vertuous wife of Capt. John Harris, who dyed the last day of October, 1649.
author: Wharton, George, Sir, 1596-1672.
notes: Signed at end: W.G., i.e. Sir George Wharton.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
